key: Is this the way to \C[3]Elphaba\C[0]'s house?
original: Is this the way to \C[3]Elphaba\C[0]'s house?
translation: 这是通往\C[3]埃尔珐芭\C[0]房子的路吗？

key: I am the servant of Master \C[3]Elphaba\C[0].
original: I am the servant of Master \C[3]Elphaba\C[0].
translation: 我是\C[3]埃尔珐芭\C[0]大人的仆从

key: You are currently in the realm of an Evil Spirit!
original: You are currently in the realm of an Evil Spirit!
translation: 你现在在邪灵的领地内！

key: I tried to communicate with you but somehow got disturbed by the evil energy.
original: I tried to communicate with you but somehow got disturbed by the evil energy.
translation: 我试着提醒你但一直被邪恶力量干扰

key: There's no way to escape from here by yourself nor I can do anything with it.
original: There's no way to escape from here by yourself nor I can do anything with it.
translation: 你自己是出不去的，我也帮不上什么忙

key: They exist to destroy and kill.
original: They exist to destroy and kill.
translation: 它们生来只想杀戮毁灭。

key: Their favorite is consuming living things' fear.
original: Their favorite is consuming living things' fear.
translation: 它们最喜欢以活物的恐惧为食。
难道我今天就要栽在这里了？！
最坏的情况应该就是了。

key: Don't let fear settle in your heart.
original: Don't let fear settle in your heart.
translation: 别让恐惧在你心中生根。

key: It can be used as an Explosion Spell.
original: It can be used as an Explosion Spell.
translation: 这块石头可以作为一次性爆炸魔法使用。

key: Only use it at the critical moment.
original: Only use it at the critical moment.
translation: 所以你得在危急关头才能用它。

key: I have used all my energy to communicate and transfer the spell stone to you.
original: I have used all my energy to communicate and transfer the spell stone to you.
translation: 我已经尽全力把这块石头给你了。

key: I can sense its stinky rotten energy.
original: I can sense its stinky rotten energy.
translation: 我能感受到那怪物的腐臭能量。
它不会一上来就干掉你。

key: Those things like making fun of its victim while enjoying their fear.
original: Those things like making fun of its victim while enjoying their fear.
translation: 它最喜欢享受猎物恐惧的滋味。
我会尽力把\C[3]埃尔珐芭\C[0]主人叫来的。

key: Why am I getting into this!?
original: Why am I getting into this!?
translation: 为什么我会卷入这种事情里？！

key: Magic energy has come to this land.
original: Magic energy has come to this land.
translation: 自从魔法什么的出现在这里。
现在不是说这些的时候。

key: I've finally found someone around here!
original: I've finally found someone around here!
translation: 终于在这儿见到个活人了！

key: Do you know how to get out of this fucking place?
original: Do you know how to get out of this fucking place?
translation: 你知道要怎么从这鬼地方出去吗？

key: I can feel a weird feeling from him.
original: I can feel a weird feeling from him.
translation: 我感觉他身上有什么怪怪的。

key: Been walking for like hours and still in the same place.
original: Been walking for like hours and still in the same place.
translation: 转了老半天还是在原地没动。

key: Two heads are better than one.
original: Two heads are better than one.
translation: 三个臭皮匠顶个诸葛亮。

key: It's giving me a weird shit...
original: It's giving me a weird shit...

key: Ok, that sounds like a good plan.
original: Ok, that sounds like a good plan.

key: At least I'm safe for now.
original: At least I'm safe for now.

key: Not sure what "it" is up to but I should be on high alert...
original: Not sure what "it" is up to but I should be on high alert...
translation: 不确定那怪物什么时候蹦出来，我得小心点...

key: I can't see any emotions on its face...
original: I can't see any emotions on its face...
translation: 它脸上什么表情都没有...

key: It's giving my back shivers even though it's wetting sweet right now...
original: It's giving my back shivers even though it's wetting sweet right now...
translation: 明明这么冷，我的背上现在却汗湿透了...

key: Is there something on my face?
original: Is there something on my face?
translation: 我脸上有什么怪东西吗？
看看有什么"不同"的地方。

key: It feels like a loop in here.
original: It feels like a loop in here.
translation: 感觉我们一直在这儿绕圈子

key: Keep looking! I hope we can get out of here soon.
original: Keep looking! I hope we can get out of here soon.
translation: 继续看看吧，但愿我们能早点离开这儿。

key: How long have I been running?
original: How long have I been running?

key: I'm so tired that I can't feel my legs anymore...
original: I'm so tired that I can't feel my legs anymore...
translation: 累死我了...已经感觉不到腿了...

key: I-I was just... looking for you...
original: I-I was just... looking for you...

key: Then you will go with me!
original: Then you will go with me!

key: A magic shield can save you once but it can't save you forever.
original: A magic shield can save you once but it can't save you forever.
translation: 魔法护盾能救你一次，可救不了你千万次。

key: I could feel it from the Necklace that \C[3]Elphaba\C[0] gave me!
original: I could feel it from the Necklace that \C[3]Elphaba\C[0] gave me!
translation: 好像是从\C[3]埃尔珐芭\C[0]给我的项链里来的！

key: It's strange I don't feel any fear released from you from the beginning till now.
original: It's strange I don't feel any fear released from you from the beginning till now.
translation: 真怪，我现在感觉不到你身上的恐惧了。

key: I lost my interest in playing games with you.
original: I lost my interest in playing games with you.

key: Your meat and blood will be your most valuable.
original: Your meat and blood will be your most valuable.
translation: 接下来该吃你的肉饮你的血了。

key: Before I will be consumed by you...
original: Before I will be consumed by you...

key: I want to take a closer look at you.
original: I want to take a closer look at you.

key: I will grant your last wish.
original: I will grant your last wish.

key: Take a closer look at my being and your shaking soul will be...
original: Take a closer look at my being and your shaking soul will be...
translation: 好好看看我，让你颤抖的灵魂变成...

key: I can feel so much fear releasing from you.
original: I can feel so much fear releasing from you.
translation: 我能感到你身上散发出来的恐惧。

key: I should have shown my true self from the beginning.
original: I should have shown my true self from the beginning.
translation: 早知道我一开始就该展示出真面目的。

key: You're the ugliest walking thing that ever existed!
original: You're the ugliest walking thing that ever existed!
translation: 你真是丑的不能再丑了！

key: I will eat everything of you as slowly as I can!
original: I will eat everything of you as slowly as I can!
translation: 我会一点一点吃掉你的！

key: You will be suffered from eternal pain still your...
original: You will be suffered from eternal pain still your...
translation: 让你承受无尽的折磨直到你...

key: The biggest mistake of villains is talking too much.
original: The biggest mistake of villains is talking too much.
translation: 反派总是死于废话太多。

key: Maybe, talk less next time and you could get my ass.
original: Maybe, talk less next time and you could get my ass.
